name: Re: Infiltration
description:
Become the agent in charge of keeping the world safe.  As CODE:SILENT, you are tasked with deactivating the Malfunctioned Defender AI created by the military with the developed virus, with the help of the HQ.

On your route to the Defender AI's quarters, you'll run into the Patroller Robots. Without firearms, you'll have to rely on your suits' agility to obtain access to the building's facilities and equipment while avoiding the opponents.

  • Skate through the night and explore the futuristic laboratory.
  • Challenging Puzzle Solving under Enemy Pressure.
  • Speedrun experience and compete among the top of leaderboards
